Package com.wileyedge.fashiontrendanalysis.dao

Class CategoryDaoImplTest

java.lang.Object
com.wileyedge.fashiontrendanalysis.dao.CategoryDaoImplTest
@ExtendWith(org.mockito.junit.jupiter.MockitoExtension.class) public class CategoryDaoImplTest extends Object
Test class for CategoryDaoImpl. It tests the database operations related to the Category entity.
